name: Ad Infinitum (Auroriax (Tom H.))
description:
A puzzle game about infinite mirror reflections.
Move with arrow keys/WASD. [Z] to undo, [R] to restart, [X] to toggle laser visibility, [Esc] for level select.

Rules:
Move the eyeball with the arrow keys/WASD. Push the mirrors by walking into them. You can even push multiple mirrors in a row!
Place the mirrors so that they reflect light circularly, creating an infinity mirror effect. In other words, if a mirror receives a beam of light, it must also reflect that light into another mirror.

If you get really stuck, don't forget you can play the levels in any order!
Good luck!

Made with my fork of Puzzlescript (more details & credits here).
